Name: Scrapple
Description: Making connections between ideas is as simple as dragging and dropping one note onto another. And unlike real paper, in Scapple you can move notes around and never run out of space.

Name: Xmind
Description: XMind is the most professional and popular mind mapping tool. Millions of people use XMind to clarify thinking, manage complex information, brainstorming, get work organized,remote and work from home WFH.

Name: Bubbl.us
Description: Mind map and brainstorm online with Bubbl.us! Create colorful mind maps to print or share with others. Millions of people are using Bubbl.us worldwide to generate ideas, map outprocesses and create presentations.

Name: Mind42
Description: Get an overview about the different kind of mind map created on Mind42. Mind42 is a free online mind mapping software that allows you to collaborate on and publish yourmind maps with others.

Name: Coggle
Description: The clear way to share complex information. Coggle is a collaborative mind-mapping tool that helps you make sense of complex things. Create unlimited mind maps andeasily share them with friends and colleagues.

Name: MindMup
Description: Free online mind mapping. The most productive online mind map canvas on the Web. Supports Freemind mindmap import/export. Easy mindmapping software.

Name: MindNode
Description: MindNode lets you capture, organize, style and share your thoughts.

Name: MindMaple
Description:
MindMaple is a fast and intuitive way of organizing information
for project management, brainstorming and more.

Name: Sligrid
Description: No more hosting team or personal wikis. Sligrid takes the pain out of knowledge management. You and your team can easily index, reuse, and share thoughts, in one place.

Name: MindMeister
Description: 100% customizable mind map designs! Change alignments, add images, videos, etc. Invite your team, comment and vote - Try the free plan or go Pro!

Name: Microsoft Visio
Description: Get the Visio Professional 2019 at Microsoft Store and compare products with the latest customer reviews and ratings. Download or ship for free. Free returns.

Name: Google Drawing
Description: Choose from a wide variety of shapes to create diagrams and charts. Free from Google.

Name: diagrams.net
Description: diagrams.net is an open source technology stack for building diagramming applications, and the worldâ€™s most widely used browser-based end-user diagramming software.

Name: Balsamiq Wireframe
Description: Balsamiq Wireframes is the industry standard quick and easy low-fidelity UI wireframing tool. It makes work fun!

Name: Lucidchart
Description: Use the Lucidchart Learning Center to navigate to any type of diagram, access diagramming tutorial guides, or learn about specific features and integrations that can enhanceprocesses within your role.

Name: StarUML
Description: A sophisticated software modeler for agile and concise modeling

Name: Enterprise Architect
Description: Enterprise Architect is Sparx Systems flagship product that provides Full Lifecycle Modeling for Business, Software and Systems.

Name: GenMyModel
Description: Software Modeling in the Cloud

Name: Violet UML Editor
Description: Violet is a free UML editor with these benefits : very easy to learn and use, draws nice-looking diagrams, cross-platform. Violet is intended for developers, students, teachers,and authors who need to produce simple UML diagrams quickly

Name: Astah
Description: Astah is a leading developer of diagramming and modeling software for individuals and teams. Explore Astah's software offerings for your workflow today!

Name: Software Ideas Modeler
Description: Powerful diagram CASE tool for software design, documentation and business processes using UML, BPMN, SysML, ArchiMate & other diagrams.

Name: Dia Diagram Editor
Description: Dia is free (open source) drawing software. Sketch your favorite structured diagrams! Windows version available as a free download.

Name: yED Graph Editor
Description: High-quality software components for graph analysis, automatic graph layout, and visualization.
